review: I have two of these.  Work great!  Frequently watch Amazon videos and Netflix without issues.
author: brc1981

review: You need amazing wiFI or mine is faulty. My WiFI works with everything else problem free, all devices, phones, tablets etc. When I move the firestick not even 20ft to plug it into the TV in the living room it drops the connection or wont even connect???? I can not move my router and equipment to the living room where the firestick is supposed to be. It only works in one room where no one is?
author: Jennifer

review: Fire stick is awesome!! For $25 you cannot get better that this.
author: Jitan Arora

review: Best money i have ever spent on entertainment!
author: Kent W Rabourn

review: easy install - however make sure your account is set to USA - it will not work if your account is set to any other country - just an FYI for the internationals out there
author: Karen
